origin.title: Origin name
origin.description: The Faros origin name used for uploaded entries. Must be unique.

accept_input_records_origin.title: Accept input records origin
accept_input_records_origin.description: Whether to accept the origin field (if present) of input records. If enabled, the input records origin will only be changed according to the replacements specified by 'Replace Records Origin'. Otherwise, the input records origin are ignored and overwritten.

replace_origin_map.title: Replace Records Origin
replace_origin_map.description: JSON map to replace records origin values, where each entry (origin1, origin2) indicates that the output records' origin property should be replaced from 'origin1' by 'origin2'

exclude_fields_map.title: Exclude Fields
exclude_fields_map.description: JSON map to exclude specific records field values, where each entry (model, fields[]) indicates that the records' fields of specific model type should be removed

dry_run.title: Dry run
dry_run.description: Process all input records but avoid writing into Faros API

invalid_record_strategy.title: Invalid record strategy
invalid_record_strategy.description: Strategy to follow to handle an invalid input record.

jsonata_expression.title: JSONata expression
jsonata_expression.description: JSONata expression for converting input records. If provided applies the expression based on specified JSONata apply mode.

jsonata_mode.title: JSONata apply mode
jsonata_mode.description: JSONata apply mode when converting input records.

jsonata_destination_models.title: JSONata destination models
jsonata_destination_models.description: Destination models when using JSONata expression. If '*' is provided we assume that all models are being modified.

keep_alive.title: HTTP Keep Alive
keep_alive.description: Should keep connection between client and server alive
